fullDescription.intro: Creates a calibration table with ranking for further calibration of the test data sets. Ranking is sorting by class probabilities provided by predictor nodes. Note that predictor must provide the class probabilities for the predictions in order to apply conformal prediction.
fullDescription.option: A column with target column that is being predicted.
If checked all columns from input table will be also included into output table along with calibration columns.

ports.inPort: Table provided by predictor nodes with class probabilities.
ports.outPort: Calibration table with ranks for each class.
